channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Mass killings in 2025 in the US hit the lowest level since 2006
item.description: Seventeen mass killings have occurred this year in the U.S., the lowest since 2006. Experts say this probably isn’t the start of a bigger trend.

item.title: A California family was about to cut the cake when gunfire erupted at a toddler’s birthday party
A list of mass killings in the United States this year
